JumpCloud 在“持续事件”中重置了管理 API 密钥https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/jumpcloud-resets-admin-api-keys-amid-ongoing-incident/ Thu, 06 Jul 2023 06:23:56 -0400阿克斯·夏尔马Securityhttps://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/jumpcloud-resets-admin-api-keys-amid-ongoing-incident/ JumpCloud, a US-based enterprise software firm is notifying several customers of an "ongoing incident." As a caution, the company has invalidated existing admin API keys to protect its customer organizations. Headquartered in Colorado, the cloud-based directory-as-a-service platform serves over 180,000 organizations across the world. [...]
